articles.description: An expert warned that animal coronavirus, detected in 15 states’ deer populations, could “come back and haunt us in the future.”
articles.content: Members of the white-tailed deer population of Staten Island have tested positive for the Omicron variant of coronavirus. Though researchers previously identified coronavirus cases in deer in 15 stat… [+773 chars]
